casebody.data:
IN RE the MARRIAGE OF John R. LOCKARD and Laura L. Lockard Upon the Petition of John R. Lockard, Petitioner-Appellant/Cross-Appellee, And Concerning Laura L. Lockard, Respondent-Appellee/Cross-Appellant. No. 17-0732 Court of Appeals of Iowa. Filed March 21, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed in part and Affirmed as Modified in part on Appeal; Affirmed in part, Affirmed as Modified in part, and Reversed in part on Cross-Appeal.
